KeywordItem.description: A keyword from the keyword analysis.

term.description: The keyword found in the given text.

probability.description: The weight or probability of the keyword in the text.

KeywordOutput.description: The output of the keyword extraction analysis.

color.description: The Qwiery-specific color this tag has.

PosOutput.description: The POS info returned from the part-of speech analysis.

SentimentOutput.description: The info returned by the sentiment analysis.

score.description: The sentiment score corresponding to the sum of scores of the contributing words.

comparative.description: The ratio of the score versus the amount of words.

tokens.description: The words recognized in the given text.

words.description: The words contributing to the sentiment score.

positive.description: The words contributing to a positive score.

negative.description: The words contributing to a negative score.
